resources.string:
Hi %s, Welcome to CrossChat Message Analyser…

Let\'s have a deal, first you send me a message and I promise to analyse its content the best I can, then I will reply with all my findings as soon as I finish.

If there\'re findings I will reply with a JSON object plus a nicely formatted message, otherwise, I will reply only with an empty JSON.

I\'m waiting for your messages… ;)
I\'m afraid, I\'m not able to analyse your message :(
